name: Basket Catch (dalon9)
description:
Help the little cows to catch all the produce with your basket by making it bounce off rocks and bushes!

Controls

Drag and drop objects from the right into the play area to make the produce bounce into the basket. 

Press start to make the produce start dropping.

Credits
  • Art and idea by @vein
  • Programming by @stefan-laimer
  • Music by @cocapasteque
